top_trends.topic: Voice agents that can take real customer calls
top_trends.why_now: Real‑time speech + tool use demos went viral; multiple startups shipped call-handling betas.
implications: Tier‑1 support could shift from chat to phone again (with lower cost).
UX expectations: instant, natural turn‑taking and safe escalation.
New compliance surface: call recording, consent, PII redaction.

evidence.title: Viral demo: realtime voice agent booking appointments
Discussion: building reliable voice agents in production

top_trends.topic: AI video creation moving from ‘generation’ to ‘editing + control’
top_trends.why_now: Creators are posting workflows where AI is a controllable editor, not a slot machine.
implications: B2B: marketing teams will expect template + brand controls.

evidence.title: What video tools are actually usable day-to-day?
Launches: AI video editors with brand kits

top_trends.why_now: Teams are tired of dashboards; buzz around natural-language analytics with governance and audit trails.
implications: B2B SaaS: AI-assisted insights becomes table stakes.
Need guardrails: query preview, permissions, and lineage.

evidence.title: Show HN: ask your database questions, get charts back
Trending repos: semantic layer + NLQ toolkits

apps.name: CallPilot AI
apps.one_liner: Voice agent that answers inbound support calls and escalates with full transcripts.

top_evidence.title: Thread: shipping a voice agent in production (CallPilot)
Can voice agents be safe without strict guardrails?

try_plan_30min: Replay 10 recorded calls (or scripted calls) and score intent accuracy
Test escalation to human + transcript quality
Check admin controls: allowed actions, redaction, retention
Validate integrations (Helpdesk/CRM) and export formats
watchouts: Hallucinated policy claims in edge scenarios

apps.name: InboxSherpa
apps.one_liner: AI triage for shared inboxes: auto-labels, drafts, and SLA risk alerts.

top_evidence.title: We tried InboxSherpa for support: worth it?

try_plan_30min: Upload 20 anonymized tickets and compare draft accuracy
Test routing rules (VIP, churn risk, refunds)
Measure time-to-first-value and review UX
Check integration depth with your helpdesk
watchouts: Needs human review for billing/refund tickets

apps.name: Storyboard Studio
apps.one_liner: Turns prompts into short-form videos with editable scenes and consistent characters.

top_evidence.title: Viral: ‘make a mini ad’ challenge with Storyboard Studio

try_plan_30min: Create 3 videos (15–30s) with different styles
Test scene edits: swap shot, fix text, keep character
Export to TikTok/Reels format and check quality
Gauge friction: onboarding, paywall, share

apps.name: PocketTutor
apps.one_liner: AI tutor with voice + camera that ‘walks you through’ homework step-by-step.

top_evidence.title: Is PocketTutor accurate enough for high school math?

try_plan_30min: Test 10 problems across difficulty levels
Check for hallucinations and correction behavior
Assess parental controls and safety settings
Evaluate habit loop: reminders, streaks, goals

apps.name: AgentFlow OSS
apps.one_liner: Open-source agent workflow builder with evaluation harnesses.
try_plan_30min: Run quickstart locally and build a 2-step agent flow
Add a simple eval set (10 prompts) and run regression
Test connector you care about (Slack/Docs/DB)
Check deployment story and observability
